welcome_message_body: Welcome to Dale City, a charming city known for its friendly locals, historic sites, and beautiful parks. We invite you to explore and enjoy all that our city has to offer during your stay!

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Warrenton-Fauquier Airport provides services for commercial and private flights.

wifi.note: Complimentary WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal A
terminals.description: This terminal serves domestic flights operated by American Airlines and its regional partners.

terminals.name: Terminal B
terminals.description: This terminal serves domestic and international flights operated by Alaska Airlines, Delta Air Lines, and United Airlines.

terminals.name: Terminal C
terminals.description: This terminal serves domestic and international flights operated by JetBlue and Southwest Airlines.

wifi.note: Passengers can connect to the network for free for up to 45 minutes per day.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Washington Dulles International Airport serves domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Concourse A
terminals.description: Concourse A at Washington Dulles International Airport serves mainly international flights.

terminals.name: Concourse B
terminals.description: Concourse B at Washington Dulles International Airport serves domestic flights.

terminals.name: Concourse C
terminals.description: Concourse C at Washington Dulles International Airport serves mainly domestic flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Potomac Airfield Airport serves all commercial and private flights.

terminals.name: Executive Terminal
terminals.description: The executive terminal at Potomac Airfield Airport caters to private and corporate flights.

wifi.note: Complimentary WiFi is available throughout the airport.
